thread.title: Ethiopia's state of emergency to last for 6 months

title: Ethiopia's state of emergency to last for 6 months
text:
Ethiopia's state of emergency to last for 6 months 11:43am EST - 01:35 
A state of emergency imposed in Ethiopia a day after the prime minister resigned will last for six months, the defence minister said on Saturday, as authorities sought to tamp down unrest in Africa's second most populous nation. Lucy Fielder reports.
